pages.text: $(li)The Ice Pit is a hole with an underground structure with its entrance in the surface.$(br)$(li)Some dangerous creatures as the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/stray)Strays$(/l) can be found inside.$(br)$(li)This structure can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_tundra)Snowy Tundras$(/l) of the Overworld.
